scripts.run:dev: yarn stop && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start src/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:dev-cluster: yarn stop && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start src/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod: yarn stop && yarn build:both && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-cluster: yarn stop && yarn build:both && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-debug: yarn stop && yarn build:both && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-debug-cluster: yarn stop && yarn build:both && sudo pm2 flush && sudo pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && sudo pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-node: yarn stop && yarn build:both && NODE_ENV=production node build/server/server.js
scripts.run:prod-babel: yarn stop && yarn build:both && NODE_ENV=production babel-node build/server/server.js
scripts.pm2:update: sudo yarn global add pm2@latest && sudo pm2 update
scripts.install:packages-global: sudo yarn global add pm2@latest flow-bin@latest babel-cli@latest
scripts.install:packages-prod: sudo yarn add express react react-dom babel-runtime
scripts.install:packages-dev: sudo yarn add --dev eslint eslint-plugin-react babel-eslint stylelint babel-core babel-plugin-transform-runtime babel-preset-latest babel-preset-flow babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-2 webpack style-loader css-loader postcss-loader precss babel-loader react-hot-loader webpack-dev-middleware webpack-hot-middleware
